item.title: LF Edge bringing a unified open source framework for the Edge
item.description: Recently the Linux Foundation launched LF Edge as an umbrella organisation to establish an open interoperable framework for edge computing, independent of hardware, silicon, cloud or operating system. This is very close to Foundries.ioâ€™s heart and mission.
